biotools.summary: Server which scans upstream of genes in the same gene expression cluster for regulatory sequence motifs using a Gibbs sampling strategy.  The Markov background model is used for non-motif bases, improving specificity of predicted motif locations.

bioschemas.name: BioProspector
bioschemas.summary: Server which scans upstream of genes in the same gene expression cluster for regulatory sequence motifs using a Gibbs sampling strategy.  The Markov background model is used for non-motif bases, improving specificity of predicted motif locations.
